helpTooltip.[data-tooltip-id='color-saved']: Add colors to this section to reuse them. Upon updating your page, these colors will be saved.
helpTooltip.[data-tooltip-id='color-theme']: These colors are determined by your theme. You can change these colors by customizing your theme.
helpTooltip.[data-tooltip-id='background-size']: The cover area background size is recomended for images that should span the full width of an area. Tiled background size is ideal for patterns and small images.
helpTooltip.[data-tooltip-id='background-scroll-effe: Control the way your background image moves as a visiter scrolls down the page. To preview these effects visit your site outside of the Page & Post Editor.
helpTooltip.[data-tooltip-id='text-effect']: Use Effects to add shadows and make text more pronounced.
helpTooltip.[data-tooltip-id='box-padding']: Padding is used to create space around your content, inside your text background.
helpTooltip.[data-tooltip-id='box-margin']: Margin is used to create space around your background, outside your text background.
helpTooltip.[data-tooltip-id='spacing']: Letter Spacing will change the distance between characters. Line Spacing changes the distances between lines.
